name: Planar Adaptation
text: Planar adaptation grants you immunity to the harmful environmental effects of a particular plane of existence, including such hazards as toxicity, extreme temperatures, and lack of air. Additionally, you gain energy resistance 20 to a single energy type prevalent on that plane (choose one if more than one type is equally prevalent). Planar adaptation has no effect when cast upon your native plane.
text_zh:
位面适应可以让你能够避免受到其他位面的有害环境的影响，例如毒性、极端温度、缺乏空气等。

此外，你针对这个位面会造成的单一能量伤害类型能够获得20点抗力 (如果有多种，选择其中一种)。

当你处于你的自然位面时，该法术没有效果。
